speaker: DOCTOR
text: I have two nights watched with you but can

speaker: DOCTOR
text: perceive no truth in your report. When was it she

speaker: DOCTOR
text: last walked?

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: Since his Majesty went into the field, I

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: have seen her rise from her bed, throw her nightgown

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: upon her, unlock her closet, take forth paper,

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: fold it, write upon ’t, read it, afterwards seal it, and

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: again return to bed; yet all this while in a most fast

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: sleep.

speaker: DOCTOR
text: A great perturbation in nature, to receive at

speaker: DOCTOR
text: once the benefit of sleep and do the effects of

speaker: DOCTOR
text: watching. In this slumb’ry agitation, besides her

speaker: DOCTOR
text: walking and other actual performances, what at any

speaker: DOCTOR
text: time have you heard her say?

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: That, sir, which I will not report after

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: her.

speaker: DOCTOR
text: You may to me, and ’tis most meet you

speaker: DOCTOR
text: should.

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: Neither to you nor anyone, having no

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: witness to confirm my speech.

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: Lo you, here she comes. This is her very guise and,

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: upon my life, fast asleep. Observe her; stand close.

speaker: DOCTOR
text: How came she by that light?

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: Why, it stood by her. She has light by

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: her continually. ’Tis her command.

speaker: DOCTOR
text: You see her eyes are open.

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: Ay, but their sense are shut.

speaker: DOCTOR
text: What is it she does now? Look how she rubs

speaker: DOCTOR
text: her hands.

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: It is an accustomed action with her to

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: seem thus washing her hands. I have known her

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: continue in this a quarter of an hour.

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: Yet here’s a spot.

speaker: DOCTOR
text: Hark, she speaks. I will set down what comes

speaker: DOCTOR
text: from her, to satisfy my remembrance the more

speaker: DOCTOR
text: strongly.

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: Out, damned spot, out, I say! One. Two.

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: Why then, ’tis time to do ’t. Hell is murky. Fie, my

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: lord, fie, a soldier and afeard? What need we fear

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: who knows it, when none can call our power to

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: account? Yet who would have thought the old man

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: to have had so much blood in him?

speaker: DOCTOR
text: Do you mark that?

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: The Thane of Fife had a wife. Where is

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: she now? What, will these hands ne’er be clean? No

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: more o’ that, my lord, no more o’ that. You mar all

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: with this starting.

speaker: DOCTOR
text: Go to, go to. You have known what you should

speaker: DOCTOR
text: not.

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: She has spoke what she should not,

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: I am sure of that. Heaven knows what she has

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: known.

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: Here’s the smell of the blood still. All

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: the perfumes of Arabia will not sweeten this little

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: hand. O, O, O!

speaker: DOCTOR
text: What a sigh is there! The heart is sorely

speaker: DOCTOR
text: charged.

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: I would not have such a heart in my

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: bosom for the dignity of the whole body.

speaker: DOCTOR
text: Well, well, well.

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: Pray God it be, sir.

speaker: DOCTOR
text: This disease is beyond my practice. Yet I have

speaker: DOCTOR
text: known those which have walked in their sleep,

speaker: DOCTOR
text: who have died holily in their beds.

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: Wash your hands. Put on your nightgown.

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: Look not so pale. I tell you yet again, Banquo’s

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: buried; he cannot come out on ’s grave.

speaker: DOCTOR
text: Even so?

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: To bed, to bed. There’s knocking at the

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: gate. Come, come, come, come. Give me your

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: hand. What’s done cannot be undone. To bed, to

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text: bed, to bed.

speaker: DOCTOR
text: Will she go now to bed?

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text: Directly.

speaker: DOCTOR
text:
Foul
               
              whisp’rings
               
              are
               
              abroad
              .
               
              Unnatural
               
              deeds

speaker: DOCTOR
text:
Do
               
              breed
               
              unnatural
               
              troubles
              .
               
              Infected
               
              minds

speaker: DOCTOR
text:
To
               
              their
               
              deaf
               
              pillows
               
              will
               
              discharge
               
              their
               
              secrets
              .

speaker: DOCTOR
text:
More
               
              needs
               
              she
               
              the
               
              divine
               
              than
               
              the
               
              physician
              .

speaker: DOCTOR
text:
God
              ,
               
              God
               
              forgive
               
              us
               
              all
              .
               
              Look
               
              after
               
              her
              .

speaker: DOCTOR
text:
Remove
               
              from
               
              her
               
              the
               
              means
               
              of
               
              all
               
              annoyance

speaker: DOCTOR
text:
And
               
              still
               
              keep
               
              eyes
               
              upon
               
              her
              .
               
              So
              ,
               
              good
               
              night
              .

speaker: DOCTOR
text:
My
               
              mind
               
              she
               
              has
               
              mated
              ,
               
              and
               
              amazed
               
              my
               
              sight
              .

speaker: DOCTOR
text:
I
               
              think
               
              but
               
              dare
               
              not
               
              speak
              .

speaker: GENTLEWOMAN
text:
Good
               
              night
              ,
               
              good
               
              doctor
              .
